alert.note: Alert for Butler; Lancaster; Saunders; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:58PM CDT until May 12 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lancaster County in southeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Seward County in southeastern Nebraska... Eastern Butler County in east central Nebraska... Western Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raymond, or 12 miles northwest of Lincoln, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Valparaiso around 515 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Weston, Malmo, Bruno, Prague and Abie. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern and east central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
